text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 13
The case concerns the length of administrative proceedings brought by the applicant in August 1993. The proceedings ended in November 1998 (over 5 years 3 months).
Not necessary to examine under Article 13 (unanimous).

Article 41 - The Court awarded 30,000 francs (FRF) in respect of non-pecuniary damage, 5,000 francs for the costs incurred in the domestic proceedings and 10,000 francs for the costs incurred in the proceedings before the Convention bodies.

© Council of Europe/European Court of Human Rights
This summary by the Registry does not bind the Court.
